title: 'A Solid Mouse with Some Minor Hiccups'
body: I recently purchased this mouse and overall, I'm quite satisfied with its performance and features.  Pros:  Ergonomic Design: The mouse has an easy-to-hold grip, providing a comfortable experience during extended use.  Smooth Scrolling: The scroll wheel functions seamlessly, allowing for smooth navigation and enhanced user experience.  Auto Power-off: The automatic switch-off feature is a great energy-saving addition, ensuring longer battery life.  Affordable: The mouse comes at a reasonable price point, making it a good value for its features.  Cons:  Stiff Buttons: The left and right buttons can be a bit hard to click, which might cause fatigue during prolonged usage.  Occasional Cursor Jumps: There were instances where the cursor jumped unexpectedly, which can be a bit frustrating when precision is needed.  USB Dongle Insertion: Inserting and removing the USB dongle can be a bit tricky due to a tight fit, requiring a bit of extra effort.  Note to Users: Some complaints about the power cell holder could be due to improper closure. Make sure to securely close the power cell holder to prevent any issues.  In conclusion, this mouse offers a comfortable grip and smooth scrolling, coupled with an attractive price point. While the buttons may require some extra effort to click, and occasional cursor jumps can occur, these are manageable issues considering the overall value this mouse provides.

title: 'Bought this mouse by prioritize one point which is a LONG BATTERY LIFE and product is not worth'
body: I bought this mouse by prioritize one point which is a LONG BATTERY LIFE. It's not even a month a purchased and past 2 days mouse connectivity has been lost in between. I need to remove battery and restart and that too works for 5 minutes only. Seems battery life did not work as described in product detail.
